aboutpage.title: About Page
aboutpage.para1: Welcome to the Harsh Israni's Resume. This website is hosted in the AWS data center and uses various AWS products to provide services. The website owner establish and operate this website is for understanding different cloud products and programming languages and technologies, and also demostrating the process of learning cloud technology to people who have passion in learning cloud meanwhile without technological knowledge.

educations.award: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

selfdescriptions: I am a results-oriented professional who enjoys working in fast-paced atmospheres.

My background demonstrates the ability to cross-collaborate with multiple departments to execute joint initiatives and analyze company processes to improve operational efficiency via keen software solutions. My peers know me as a self-starter with excellent communication skills and a team player with the ability to work with people from diverse backgrounds.
I look forward to meeting you! You can reach me at +7666623339 or israni0703@gmail.com.

previousjobs.title: Analyst Programmer
description: Hands-on experience on UiPath for developing back office bots.
Knowledge in all phases of SDLC such as Analysis, Design, Development, Integration, Implementation, and Maintenance.
Experience in developing, designing, testing and deployment of  RPA (Robotics Process Automation) solutions using UiPath
Work on Extracted data from the web application, Windows Application, PDF, Images and web pages, etc. and exported to output data to database/excel
Hands-on experience in Automating Web interfaces, desktop application interfaces

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.content: This website uses both Infrastructures As A Service (IAAS) and Function As A Service (FAAS). Web server of this website is on AWS Amazon Linux with Apache as the webserver and Angular for UI rendering. Those supporting services such as email delivery in the 'Contact Me' page or pushing message to Chatbot are done by Lambda Function. Some services are fully managed by AWS such as Simple Email Service (SES) and AWS Comprehend which provide API for me to send requests and AWS will be responsible for scale-up or failover.

availibility.title: Availibility
availibility.content: The infrastructure of our services such as SES for mail delivery, Lambda Function as API is managed by AWS. AWS will help us to maintain the availability and scale up the resource automatically if necessary.

development.title: Development
development.content: This website also using Git for source control. Lambda Function can also be found in the Github repository.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.content: I am trying Continue Deployment /Integration (CD/CI) on this website. Jenkins is also installed on the same server. It will listen to the Github repository and deploy the website automatically if there is any check-in. In addition, the site has been containerized and allowed to be executed on different system platforms.
